RecipeDef.label: cook a serving of stew
RecipeDef.description: Slow cooks a serving of stew from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. \n\nFood Effects: Consciousness, Metabolism, Blood Filtration, and Blood Pumping.

RecipeDef.label: cook a carnivore serving of stew
RecipeDef.description: Cook a serving of stew from meat ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in order to create the best eating experience. Producing varied flavors with meat alone introduces extra inefficiencies. \n\nFood Effects: Consciousness, Metabolism, Blood Filtration, and Blood Pumping.

RecipeDef.label: cook a vegetarian a serving of stew
RecipeDef.description: Cook a serving of stew from plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in order to create the best eating experience. RecipeDef.description: Combine various types of leather to create weak patchleather. \n\nMakes 200 Patch Leathers.

RecipeDef.description: Spin plasteel thread from plasteel metal. Used in advanced cloth weaving. \n\n Makes 25 Threads.

RecipeDef.description: weave synthread cloth from raw cotton, raw flax, and plasteel thread. \n\nMakes 10 cloth.

RecipeDef.description: weave hyperweave cloth from mixing raw cotton, raw flax, raw devilstrand, and plasteel thread. \n\nMakes 15 cloths.

RecipeDef.description: weave hyperweave cloth from mixing raw cotton, raw flax, raw devilstrand, and plasteel thread. \n\nMakes 60 cloths.

RecipeDef.description: Salvage unwanted apparel into raw materials.
